revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Ubiquiti Networks |model=EdgeRouter |revision=Lite (ERLite-3) |asin=B00HXT8EKE ,B00CPRVF5K, |price=99 |est_release_date=01/2013 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model=U78Z025T |manuf_rev=.00 |availability=now |type=router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Cavium |cpu1_model=CN5020 |cpu1_cspeed=500 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320ETTI-70G |fla2=512 KiB |fla2_brand=Winbond |fla2_model=W25X05CL |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W971GG8JB-25 |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 14 pin,, unpopulated,, J1 |serial=yes,, console port,, RJ-45,, (115200 8N1) |eth_chip1_brand=Atheros |eth_chip1_model=AR8035-A |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8035-A |eth_chip3_brand=Atheros |eth_chip3_model=AR8035-A |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Multichannel RS-232 Line Driver;Texas Instruments;MA3221C;;1;,,, Quadruple Bus Buffer Gate;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC125A;;2;,,, 3A, 4.5-27V Simple Buck Regulator;Alpha & Omega (Α&Ω);AOZ1212;;2;,,, 2A, 1MHz Synchronous Rectified Buck Converter;uPI Semi;uP1713;;2;,,, 2A Schottky Barrier Rectifier;Diodes Inc;B260/A;;2; |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.1; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.32.13-UBNT;EdgeOS;based on Vyatta Core/Debian 6.06; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=ubnt |default_pass=ubnt }} {{TagLine|Ubiquiti EdgeRouter Lite (ERLite-3) Desktop Router}} :[http://www.ubnt.com/downloads/datasheets/edgemax/EdgeRouter_DS.pdf Datasheet] {{•}} [http://www.ubnt.com/downloads/guides/edgemax/EdgeOS_UG.pdf User's Guide] :[http://www.ubnt.com/downloads/firmwares/XN-fw/v5.5.6/GPL.UBNT.v5.5.6.tar.bz2 GPL Firmware Source]
The board shown seems to indicate [[Foxconn]] manuf. (U78Z025T00) {{See also|Cavium|Ubiquiti Networks}} *[http://wiki.ubnt.com/EdgeMAX_Wiki ''Ubiquiti Networks'' Wiki]
===Reviews=== *[https://www.insidegadgets.com/2015/06/10/inside-the-ubiquiti-edgerouter-lite-router-dated-2013/ ''Teardown'' on '''InsideGadgets'''] *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/lanwan/lanwan-reviews/32012-first-look-ubiquiti-edgerouter-lite ''First Look'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :'''CPU''': [[Cavium]] ''Octeon Plus'' CN5020 @500MHz 2-cores :'''Ethernet''': 3x [[Atheros]] AR8035-A GbE PHY's :'''Flash''': On-board 4MB Flash (Macronix MX29LV320E) :'''Storage''': Internal 3.8GB USB Flash (''Kingston'' ID) drive :w/ 1.5GB free for use occupies single internal USB port.
===Reg. third party FW support=== *[http://rtfm.net/FreeBSD/ERL/ ''FreeBSD 10.0 on Ubiquiti EdgeRouter Lite'' on '''RTFM.net'''] *[http://www.daemonology.net/blog/2016-01-10-FreeBSD-EdgeRouter-Lite.html ''FreeBSD on EdgeRouter Lite'' on '''Daemonology.net'''] *[https://forum.pfsense.org/index.php?topic=63926.0 ''Ubiquiti edgerouter lite support'' on '''pfSense''' forums]
